title: RIOT READ NOW. OR IM GONE FOREVER
body: My brother tried hard to convince me to come back and play this game with him, so i did. then i had a series of lag and disconnects not even being able to connect to the game. i rebooted league....still wont let me connect.... 14 times i rebooted client. i click reconnect....window disapears....nothing happens.  rebooted my pc, logged in again tried to reconnect. window disapears......tried again 12 times later. still cant reconnect. ive spent over 1200$ on skins and champs in this game ( because i can afford to...for the haters out there) and I'm getting sick of stuff like this. Fix your stuff phreak and friends. im not even worries about the community... im worried about the service. you want my respect back? msg me back. if not...... ITS HEROES OF THE STORM.

Sounds like it's more your end than it is riot's.

Hey DatDamnAdarii!

If your having a problem getting into an actual game of League of Legends, we need to get this fixed ASAP.  If you get through Champion Selection normally, and the window minimizes and then NOTHING happens, this seems like your computer was unable to make a connection to our Game Servers.  Given this, make sure that you complete the steps in our [Connection Issues Knowledge Base Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  It has several steps that usually resolve this type of issue.

If your still consistently not able to enter a match, you don't have to give up just yet!  You can [submit a ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)and one of our Tech Specialists can respond back with further steps until we get this fully resolved.  If you do submit a ticket, make sure that you include the following:

1) Network Analysis: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1

2) NetworkInfo Log: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4

3) Process List: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3

I noticed he didn't say anything about excusing the reports. 

I got slapped by Leaverbuster after the 4.something patch came out. I was reading the Boards, and noticed that a LOT of people had the exact same problem. Perhaps be a bit more lenient if we have a legitimate excuse?

We never penalize someone for leaving a single game, or rarely leaving games due to issues beyond their control.  Only players who consistently leave games face punishments from the LeaverBuster system.  

In regards to legitimate excuses, this is much harder to track from a data stand point.  If your internet was cut out for instance, there is no way for us to determine if this occurred due to issues with your ISP or whether you simply pulled the power cord from your router.  However, this is why we give some leeway and lenience to players who disconnect from games -- we understand that "things" happen.  Therefore, the punishments are only given to those who consistently leave games.

That's not true, friend. I had been punished repeatedly for firewall errors and lags and disconnections issues from your recent patch. There is a connection problem with ISP's and your servers connecting sub-optimally. 

It is so sad the new leaver buster is insanely punishing players while they are not at fault.

This all happened since the most recent patch where you upgraded the equipments with out adequate testing.

[Phase 2 update - The North Bridge](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/0hVNFnPH-na-server-roadmap-update-pops-peering-and-the-north-bridge)

At the end of the day, we want players to have the most stable and direct route possible to our Game Servers!
